text:
Raskolnikov walked alone, silence surrounding him. 

He spotted a crowd ahead. 

“What is it?” he murmured. 

He turned right and approached. 

Shouts and talk filled the air. 

A carriage stood in the middle of the street. 

A light gleamed, drawing him closer. 

He smiled coldly, recognition dawning. 

He had decided to go to the police station. 

It would soon be over.

**PAGE SUMMARY:** Raskolnikov approaches a crowd in the dusk, feeling resolved to go to the police station as he recognizes the situation unfolding.
